title: We all know the phrase 'It'll never change.' Is there anything about your job that you know could be changed but for some reason hasn't? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think there is rarely something that *you* can’t change really. The question is if you are willing to invest your time, energy and resources into it. Take responsibility, lead and make a conscious decision in what you are willing to build and what not. Stop being a victim by demanding your environment to adjust to you!
